hero.title: Master Cloud Certifications
hero.subtitle: Practice with realistic CBT exams for AWS, GCP & Azure. Track your progress, review mistakes, and pass on your first try.

featuresSection.title: Everything You Need to Pass
featuresSection.subtitle: Built by certified professionals who understand what it takes to ace cloud exams.

features.title: Realistic CBT Experience
features.desc: Timed exams with auto-save, bookmarks, pause/resume, and question navigation — just like the real test.

features.title: Smart Analytics
features.desc: Track scores by topic, identify weak areas, and review wrong answers with detailed explanations.

features.title: Realistic Time Management
features.desc: Practice under real exam conditions and build confidence to finish within time limits.

features.title: Detailed Explanations
features.desc: Learn from comprehensive explanations for every question to understand concepts and improve.

features.title: Topic-Based Study
features.desc: Focus on specific domains and target your weak areas for efficient learning.

features.title: Multi-Cloud Coverage
features.desc: AWS, GCP, and Azure certifications in one platform. Always updated for the latest exam versions.

steps.title: Choose Your Exam
steps.desc: Select from AWS, GCP, or Azure certification practice tests.

steps.title: Take the Test
steps.desc: Experience a realistic CBT environment with timer and auto-save.

steps.title: Review & Improve
steps.desc: Analyze results, study explanations, and retake weak areas.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready.

questions.a: We currently offer practice exams for AWS certifications including AIF-C01, SAA-C03, and DEA-C01. GCP and Azure exams are coming soon.

questions.q: How realistic are the practice exams?
questions.a: Our CBT interface mirrors the actual exam experience with timed sessions, question navigation panels, bookmarking, and the same question formats you'll encounter on test day.
Yes! CloudMaster is fully responsive and works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Study anywhere, anytime.

questions.q: What happens if I lose connection during an exam?
questions.a: Your progress is auto-saved after every answer. If you lose connection or close your browser, you can resume exactly where you left off.

questions.q: How do I track my progress?
questions.a: Your dashboard shows score trends, topic-by-topic breakdowns, and identifies your weakest areas so you can focus your study time effectively.

cta.title: Ready to Get Certified?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of cloud professionals who passed their exams with CloudMaster.
